address: Phường Him Lam, Thành phố Điện Biên Phủ, Tỉnh Điện Biên
thought:
**My Analysis of Address Mapping for "Phường Him Lam", "Tỉnh Điện Biên"**

Okay, so I'm tasked with mapping an old address ("Phường Him Lam", "Tỉnh Điện Biên") to its new administrative unit. My initial steps are clear: first, identify the old ward and province. In this case, it's "Him Lam" in "Điện Biên Province". Then, I need to consult the resolutions provided.

I started by verifying if "Điện Biên Province" had been affected by any mergers. Resolution 60-NQ/TW clearly states that Điện Biên remains unchanged, which is good news.

The real challenge lies in finding "Phường Him Lam" within the provided resolutions. I found resolution 1661/NQ-UBTVQH15. This resolution states that "Phường Him Lam", along with several other wards and communes, will be *merged into* a new ward named "Phường Điện Biên Phủ". This is key: all those places *cease to exist as independent entities* and become part of "Điện Biên Phủ".

Now, I checked the "New wards" data. I found a match: `{"ward_code":"03127","ward_name":"Phường Điện Biên Phủ","province_name":"Tỉnh Điện Biên"}`. This directly corresponds to the new ward created by the merger.

However, the "New wards" list also includes `{"ward_code":"03334","ward_name":"Phường Mường Thanh","province_name":"Tỉnh Điện Biên"}`. This is where it gets a little tricky. The resolution clearly states that "Mường Thanh" is *merged into* "Điện Biên Phủ".  Having "Mường Thanh" listed as a *separate* "New ward" seems inconsistent.  It implies that "Mường Thanh" also exists as a separate ward after the merger which contradicts the stated result of the resolution.

According to the resolution, "Him Lam" is *replaced* by "Điện Biên Phủ". The new list *should* reflect that. It should only contain "Điện Biên Phủ" since "Him Lam" is no longer an existing ward.

But, the instruction I was given states that I need to make sure to include all possible new ward candidates based on the provided contents. Therefore, I must consider "Mường Thanh" a possible valid new ward candidate.

Ultimately, based on the provided information, I have to conclude that the old address "Phường Him Lam" in "Tỉnh Điện Biên" maps to **"Phường Điện Biên Phủ"**. The inclusion of "Phường Mường Thanh" in the "New wards" data, given the resolution's statement that it was merged into "Điện Biên Phủ", creates a discrepancy that needs further clarification. However, I have followed the instructions to include "all possible new ward candidates", and since "Mường Thanh" is in the list, I have to consider it.

citation.header: 1661/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Điện Biên
citation.line: 44. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các phường Him Lam, Tân Thanh, Mường Thanh, Thanh Bình, Thanh Trường và xã Thanh Minh thành phường mới có tên gọi là phường Điện Biên Phủ.
